GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Watch and wait monitoring of a patient's condition from the hospital. This allows for quicker response to issues and be necessary for high risk complications that arise from symptoms or treatments.

Removal of shallow debris and foreign objects embedded in the patient's skin or face and disinfecting the effected areas.
